Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 12 Piercing plus 10 Cold
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Slashing plus 10 Cold
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 12 Bludgeoning plus 10 Cold

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Ice Devil makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite, one with its Claws, and one with its Tail
Other Actions.Action 2: Wall of Ice, The Ice Devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice that is 1ft thick and up to 30ft long and 10ft high, or hemispherical dome up to 20ft in diameter.  When summoned, creatures in its space are pushed to either side of it.  Those creatures also make a Dexterity saving throw, taking an average 35 Cold damage from the wall

Abilities.Ability 1: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
